duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet and provide courteous customer service to all clients, visitors, and employees in person or on the telephone.
Collect and update demographic and insurance information into the Electronic Health Record.
Operate multi-line telephone system, screening calls, answering and transferring calls, and taking messages.
Refer clients to the on-call physicians or the answering service as necessary.
Collect and provide information, answering questions, and making referrals regarding health center services, providers, medical records, scheduling, insurance, and related.
Schedule and book clients for appointments with various health center services.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or general education degree (GED)
Three to five years related experience and/or training
